title: Seems not even undead Warlords of Death and Destruction are immune to feminine Charm
body:
[](http://orig13.deviantart.net/cfce/f/2015/309/1/2/charm__by_raikoart-d9ejvio.jpg)

https://www2.pic-upload.de/img/33243441/charm.gif


(A bit of technical info; No tenacity, Charm and SRS speed buff/slow resistance makes you speed towards the target that charmed you with the speed of sound...right into the fountain laser, that **IGNORES **shields)

replies.body:
Nobody can resist her seductive powers

http://i.imgur.com/cN4w50I.gif?Noredirect
https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83580-0-1493578902.png
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AFCxHmtHTGU
Why does this have me in tears?
http://orig13.deviantart.net/cfce/f/2015/309/1/2/charm__by_raikoart-d9ejvio.jpg
http://orig13.deviantart.net/bc2a/f/2017/059/b/f/to_all_the_papyton_shippers_by_hakike__guro-db0ochf.png
That's because you don't build him like he should be...immobile champion. Don't even take boots and you'll see that this charm will become a stun since you're so slow you'll barely walk 1 meter
His name is Malicious Metal. I think he knows what he's doing.
your name is AbsorbentTNT.I think you don't often get  jokes.geez, fanboys are boring

{{champion:9}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:53}} They all want dat ass.

But SPECIALLY this guy when he ults.{{champion:11}}

{{champion:11}} ulti with a {{champion:9}} fear is still one of my favorite things.

Too bad neither is played much anymore (although I'm ok with them being out of meta)

I had a normal game where, for whatever reason, I was a Fiddle support with a Caitlyn ADC and they had a Draven bot and Yi support.  Watching Yi Highlander in, Alpha, and then immediately go running away at the same speed due my fear was so satisfying.  Thanks for using all your gapclosers, now go back over there.
Have you seen this guy {{champion:126}} after it?
this is getting tiring putting a picture as thumbnail that is hidden in the post
SRS?
storm raider surge
I'm telling Sona.

She seduced Sona first.

http://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/54/c6/38/54c638ac089e9c2f5c735878c12756e0.jpg
Well of course not. That's how Sona has him. :^)

I love how she is guaranteed to lose but still is determined to take at least one with her...
That's the spirit... I must steal it from her.

Best to be a Blitzcrank in these games.  "Come into my Fountain" Penta kills are hilarious even if you lose.

Had a game as Thresh where the enemy team was trying to BM kill us in fountain.  I think I got a Quadra before they realized that maybe standing near fountain with a decently good Thresh player was a bad idea.
https://media.giphy.com/media/3lbIlcgSu1fUs/giphy.gif
soooo.....did you win? (plz tell me you lost that match cuz of that)
